        <title><![CDATA[Business Development Representative II]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
7SIGNAL is a rapidly growing technology company and needs to expand its Business Development Representative team in order to keep pace. 
  

  
We are looking for a Business Development Representative to act as the liaison between our Marketing and Sales teams. Your role will be to seek new business opportunities by contacting and developing relationships with potential customers.
  

  
To be successful in this role, you should have previous experience developing leads from marketing campaigns and meeting sales quotas. You will use your communication skills to cultivate strong relationships with customers, from first contact until you close the deal. You will also ensure proper after-sales service. If you are motivated and results-driven, and enjoy working in a team environment, we’d like to meet you.
  

  
Ultimately, you will boost sales and contribute to our long-term business growth.
  
Responsibilities
  

  
+ Qualify leads from marketing campaigns as sales opportunities
  

  
+ Contact potential clients through cold calls and emails
  

  
+ Present our company to potential clients
  

  
+ Identify client needs and suggest appropriate products/services
  

  
+ Build long-term trusting relationships with clients
  

  
+ Proactively seek new business opportunities in the market
  

  
+ Set up meetings or calls between (prospective) clients and Sales Directors
  

  
+ Report on (weekly/monthly/quarterly) sales results
  

  
+ Stay up-to-date with new products/services and new pricing
  

  
Requirements
  

  
+ 3 years of proven work experience as a Business Development Representative
  

  
+ Hands-on experience with multiple sales techniques (including cold calls)
  

  
+ Track record of achieving sales quotas
  

  
+ Experience with CRM software
  

  
+ Familiarity with MS Excel (analyzing spreadsheets and charts)
  

  
+ Understanding of sales performance metrics
  

  
+ Excellent communication and negotiation skills
  

  
+ BS degree in Marketing, Business Administration or relevant field

        <title><![CDATA[Director of Sales - New York Metro]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
Director of Sales - USA
  

  
THE OPPORTUNITY - 7SIGNAL - The Leader in Wireless Experience Monitoring 
  

  
Come join an amazing team and high growth company!! Your creativity, team effort and "go-get-em" attitude pays dividends here!
  

  
As aDirector of Sales, you are a key member of a dynamic, game-changing software company. You will:
  

  
Be responsible for the overall sales strategies and results of the New York Metro Area.
  

  
Plan and direct all sales activities to sell products/services to new and current customers to close large              enterprise deals and achieve/exceed quota.
  

  
Establish and maintain customer satisfaction in area accounts working collaboratively with systems engineering, customer support and channel partners 
  

  
Present and communicate business value effectively, matching customer requirements with company solutions.
  

  
Prospect new customers and develop effective proposals for presentation to customer. 
  

  
Have applied knowledge of the IT industry, competing technologies, emerging technology trends and local geography business environment. 
  

  
Coordinate sales and corporate resources effectively to develop new business opportunities and expand existing customer deployments.
  

  
Using salesforce.com, maintain an extremely accurate 90 day forecast, manage pipeline development and document the sales progress for each opportunity.
  

  
Can live anywhere in the New York Metro Area
  

  
QUALIFICATIONS
  

  
The ideal candidate will have these characteristics and experiences: 
  

  

  
+ Seasoned industry professional with strong experience in selling networking infrastructure and performance monitoring solutions. 
  

  
+ Has a consistent record of over achievement of sales quotas. 
  

  
+ Possesses a network of contacts and recent sales successes in large enterprise accounts in the Midwest Region.
  

  
+ Possesses excellent written, verbal, and presentation communication skills. 
  

  
+ Can sell to economic buyers as well as technical buyers, and understands how to communicate ROI, payback period, and risk avoidance concepts. 
  

  
+ Agility to learn and understand complex technologies quickly, and apply knowledge directly to customer interactions.
  

  
+ Customer focused, attuned to customer needs.
  

  
+ Places a premium on meeting customer expectations and maintaining customer satisfaction.
  

  
+ Has strong prospecting skills and motivation to create opportunities 
  

  
+ Is a strong team player, has extremely high integrity, has a very high energy level, is able to multitask effectively, and can adapt to overcome barriers to selling.
  

  
+ Holds a bachelor’s degree or equivalent training in business or sales management. 
  

  
+ Is hungry for the opportunity to work with a young, groundbreaking company.
  

  

  
About 7SIGNAL 
  

  
7SIGNAL is a leader in enterprise Wireless Experience Monitoring.  The 7SIGNAL platform is a cloud-based Wireless Network Monitoring (WNM) solution that continuously tests the wireless network for performance issues - maximizing network uptime, device connectivity and network ROI.  The platform was designed for the world’s most innovative organizations, educational institutions, hospitals and government agencies and is currently deployed at Booz Allen Hamilton, IBM, Kaiser Permanente, Walgreens, Microsoft and many others.   7SIGNAL continuously monitors the connectivity of over 4 million global devices.  Learn more at www.7signal.com.

        <title><![CDATA[Sales Operations Manager]]></title>
        <description><![CDATA[
  
  Position Overview:   7SIGNAL is looking for a Sales Operations Manager to report directly to the VP, Finance & Operations.  The Deal Desk and Operations Manager position at 7SIGNAL sits within the Finance department providing strategic, cross-functional, and comprehensive assistance to sales contracting and financial compliance, process improvements, and building scalable solutions that help our sales teams and leadership make informed decisions. 
  

  
 
  

  
  Responsibilities and Duties:  
  

  

  
+  Be the trusted advisor to the sales team, collaborating on pricing, product, and commercial terms for non-standard transactions 
  

  
+  Develop, administer, manage, and report on bookings performance in Salesforce 
  

  
+  Manage the forecasting process, drive initiatives to improve forecast accuracy, ensure critical actions visible to achieve and exceed forecast. Ensure sales forecast addresses risk and opportunity in the pipeline and deal execution, leverage analytics to support improving forecast accuracy. 
  

  
+  Manage sales KPIs and performance review cadence, leverage sales analytics for insights and actions to improve sales performance. 
  

  
+  Proactively diagnose the analytical requirements of the sales organizations; design and deliver reporting to meet their requirements 
  

  
+  Develop comprehensive pipeline reporting tools 
  

  
+  Streamline quote to cash process, ensure that all data and supporting documentation is accurate in Salesforce 
  

  
+  Implement and enforce controls around the quoting and discounting process 
  

  
+  Partner with Management on business planning and strategy for their respective sales areas 
  

  
+  Review all agreements, provide redlines, and be able to discuss agreements with prospects/customers/resellers 
  

  
+  Provide sales training and enablement of quoting, pricing, and processes 
  

  
+  Lead and assist with other special projects, as needed 
  

  

  
  Required Skills/Abilities:   
  

  

  
+  Excellent communication, analytics, and problem-solving skills and the ability to work with all levels of management and across multiple and varied functional teams from working to executive level 
  

  
+  Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail. 
  

  
+  Experience reviewing legal documents. 
  

  
+  Extensive Salesforce knowledge and ability to build reporting within Salesforce. 
  

  
+  Hubspot experience is a plus 
  

  
+  High level of motivation and self-starter 
  

  
+  8+ years
